short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collects product information from a web page and exports to a spreadsheet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you collect tour/product information from a web page and exports to a spreadsheet that calculates the average product price. A handy tool to aid your competitor research.
